name: Anger Management Arena
description:
CONTROL YOUR ANGER
OR DON'T CONTROL ANYTHING!

So... we've heard you've had some issues with your anger. It's alright! And look, we have the perfect game for you: a small arena shooter where you don't loose life or bullets or anything. Nothing to be mad about!

Well except there's a catch: the angrier you get, the more you lose control! And the more you lose control, the higher the points you get. Find the balance, hit the highest score (post it in the comments!) and stay as long as you can in the arena!

Once and for all, show them that you can control your f*cking TEMPER for f*ck's sake!

CONTROLS

🖱 Mouse/Trackpad : Click to shoot and move!

TEAM

Issaya Gauchet (dev) and Tibo Vincent-Ducimetière (art/dev)

Made in 48 hours for GMTK's Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control).
